column4: trying to understand why ubuntu updates are so slow?  only getting 19kB/s .  Is their mirrors i should be using, that are faster?
hey i had that issue..sept i was getting speeds of less than 1k
where you able to find a way to speed up downloads?
no...trying to get a faster mirror list..but it doesn't seem to be working in apt-spy, it's gathering the list from debian.org
